title: Contract between St. Louis and Union Electric

abstracts.abstract: BOARD BILL NO.285      INTRODUCED BY ALDERWOMAN DIONNE FLOWERS	 An ordinance, recommended by the Board of Public Service of the City of St. Louis, authorizing and directing the Department of Streets, on behalf of the City of St. Louis, to enter into a contract between the City of St. Louis and Union Electric Company, doing business as Ameren Missouri, a Missouri corporation, for street and outdoor lighting service for certain facilities within the territorial limits of the City of St. Louis, subject to amendment, for a period of ten (10) years commencing on the date of execution of the contract, in substantially the form and as attached hereto as Exhibit 1 with its Exhibit A, Appendix 1, and Appendix 2; and containing an emergency clause.
